chapters.title: Ravens
chapters.info: Eldrin Cauthon, p. [12]—Girl from Emond's Field. She is about two years younger than Egwene. She seems to enjoy telling on her brother, Mat, after he has gotten himself into mischief (which is quite often). See also Cauthon, Abell; Cauthon, Bodewhin; Cauthon, Natti.
